name: 中华三国志-情怀版
detailed_description:
Emotional version of the map, larger, more historical, more emotional!

1. Bigger!
Compared with the original 10000 * 10000 pixels, the map is expanded to 39000 * 39000 pixels, the map city pool spacing is larger, the battlefield is larger!

2. More history!
Topography and maps are carefully depicted according to historical rivers, mountains and rivers. Prefectures and counties are distributed in historical directions. Learn about historical geography, mountains and rivers. Start from here!

3. More affection
Feelings edition style bone interface, let your eyes shine!

short_description: Emotional version of the map, expanded to 30,000*30,000 pixels, map city pool spacing is larger, the battlefield is larger! Topography and maps are carefully depicted according to historical rivers, mountains and rivers, and the distribution of counties and counties is historically oriented.

fullgame.name: 中华三国志 the Three Kingdoms of China

supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win 7
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win 10
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
